pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Sunday, March 28, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual discussion with Fellows at the 1834 Fellowship Conference.

Closed to media.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual celebration hosted by the Canada-Greece Parliamentary Friendship Group to mark the 200th anniversary of Greece’s independence. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and participate in a conversation along with the Prime Minister of Greece, Kyriakos Mitsotakis. Minister of Foreign Affairs Marc Garneau, Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Canadian Heritage Julie Dabrusin, Member of Parliament for Saint-Laurent Emmanuella Lambropoulos, Member of Parliament for London North Centre Peter Fragiskatos, and Member of Parliament for Vimy Annie Koutrakis will also attend.

Media interested in watching the event live can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
